text: Boops is a genus of ray-finned fish with the following species: * Boops boops Linnaeus, 1758 (bogue) * Boops lineatus Boulenger, 1892 The salema porgy was once assigned to this genus before, but it is now in the monotypic genus Sarpa. == References == # "Boops". Integrated Taxonomic Information System. Retrieved 17 January 2011. Category:Perciformes
title: Boops
